iid.description: Internal ID of the merge request.

project_id.description: ID of the project to which the merge request belongs.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the merge request was created.

prepared_at.description: Timestamp when the merge request was prepared.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the merge request was last updated.

merged_at.description: Timestamp when the merge request was merged.

closed_at.description: Timestamp when the merge request was closed.

target_branch.description: Name of the target branch for the merge request.

source_branch.description: Name of the source branch for the merge request.

user_notes_count.description: Total count of user notes on the merge request.

upvotes.description: Number of upvotes for the merge request.

downvotes.description: Number of downvotes for the merge request.

assignees.description: List of users assigned to this merge request.

reviewers.description: List of reviewers assigned to the merge request.

source_project_id.description: ID of the source project for the merge request.

target_project_id.description: ID of the target project for the merge request.

labels.description: List of labels associated with the merge request.

work_in_progress.description: Flag indicating if the merge request is a work in progress.

merge_when_pipeline_succeeds.description: Flag indicating if the merge should happen when the pipeline succeeds.

discussion_locked.description: Flag indicating if discussions are locked.

should_remove_source_branch.description: Flag indicating if the source branch should be removed after merging.

force_remove_source_branch.description: Flag indicating if the source branch should be removed after merging.

references.description: List of references associated with the merge request.

web_url.description: URL to view the merge request in the GitLab UI.

time_stats.description: Time statistics related to the merge request.

squash.description: Flag indicating if squashing should be performed.

task_completion_status.description: Status of task completion for the merge request.

has_conflicts.description: Flag indicating if the merge request has conflicts.

blocking_discussions_resolved.description: Flag indicating if all blocking discussions are resolved.

approvals_before_merge.description: Total number of approvals required before the merge request can be merged.

author_id.description: ID of the author of the merge request.

assignee.description: User assigned to this merge request.

assignee_id.description: ID of the user assigned to this merge request.

closed_by.description: User who closed the merge request.

closed_by_id.description: ID of the user who closed the merge request.

milestone.description: Milestone associated with the merge request.

milestone_id.description: ID of the milestone associated with the merge request.

merged_by.description: User who merged the merge request.

merged_by_id.description: ID of the user who merged the merge request.

draft.description: Flag indicating if the merge request is a draft.

detailed_merge_status.description: Detailed status of the merge request.

squash_on_merge.description: Flag indicating if squashing should be done on merge.

id.description: ID of the user who performed the merge.

locked.description: Flag indicating if the user account is locked.
